alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 1:51PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Camden and Glynn Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 150 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm and preceeding outflow 8 miles north of Kings Bay Base, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingsland, Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Dock Junction, Kings Bay Base, Country Club Estates, Thalmann, Sea Island, Jekyll Island and Harrietts Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn
